ygData.subject: More from the diary of a barbarian princess:
ygData.msgSnippet: So I finally made it to my body in the desert of South Ro.  This time I got a troll shaman to cast SoW on me before I left the oasis and was able to easily get
ygData.messageBody:
So I finally made it to my body in the desert of South Ro. This time I got
a troll shaman to cast SoW on me before I left the oasis and was able to
easily get to my body. Once there I saw the two Trolls who had tried to
help me when I was jumped by the dry bones skeleton the first time. They
had been guarding my body, killing dervishes, and just having a good time
being trolls.

Well I talked to the trolls for a bit (their common isn�t that good, one can
see their intelligence isn�t that high). I learned then that all Trolls are
not that bad.

Well, I finished getting dressed, cut a slice of bread to feed my hungry
stomach, drank some water and off I went. I decided to run like the wind
back to the oasis and kill some crocodiles.

Once in the oasis area, I realized I still had three full backpacks dragging
me down. I have sold my stuff at the inn in Oasis before, so I decided to
risk it one more time.

I climbed up the hill overlooking the inn and looked around for errant
giants. Everything looked ok so in I ran to lighten my load.

Well anyone reading this can guess the rest. At least I sold all my extra
loot before a sand giant ripped the roof off the inn and slammed his fist
into my head. I really need to get some giant repellant as soon as I can
find some.

I have decided that I hate giants more than griffons, and one day I will
lead a hunt to destroy every giant in the world of Norrath!!


For the Honor and Glory of Rallos Zek;

Patty of Halas
username: Patricia
server: Bristlebane
